tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (1/2) From 1867-68, outbreaks of yellow fever & cholera affected economic relations between the U.S. & Spain. In this letter, Secretary Seward shares descriptions of the imposed quarantine by the Spanish government upon U.S. ships: go.usa.gov/xvKzN #FRUS #FSIatHome
